alert.note: Alert for Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:34PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Stillwater, north central Carbon and southwestern Yellowstone Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 633 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles north of Columbus to near Joliet. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusting 35 to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Billings, Laurel, Lockwood, Shepherd, Huntley, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Acton, Molt and Comanche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
